gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Permafrost Laboratory - University of Alaska Fairbanks

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This dataset contains the model output data from the soil thermal model coupled to the Terrestrial Ecosystem Model (STM-TEM) simulations across the range of black spruce ecosystems in North America.
